attributes.action: Strengthen Data Protection Laws to prevent any personal data being sold which could assist identity fraud.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We require laws to prevent key personal information such as name, address, DoB, mothers maiden name, previous addresses, or family history, etc from being publicly sold or shared. These are key elements of personal data which facilitate identity fraud and are currently sold and freely accessible worldwide on the internet.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/data-protection/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
